title: What is new in Raspberry pi 4? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi there, on Jun 24, 2019 Raspberry Pi 4 has been released and its available in 1GB, 2GB and 4GB RAM Units. In news Raspberry pi foundation also discussed about 8GB RAM unit. In the comparison of old raspberry pi, pi 4 have more RAM, USB 3.0 Ports and faster Ethernet port. As a pi user i always desired for a faster pi in same price and here we have Pi 4 which full fills my requirement. Below is my video on new Raspberry pi 4 Beginner’s Guide Video:

After Huge Success of Raspberry Pi 3 Model B and B+, Raspberry Pi Foundation unveiled the latest board in their lineup, RASPBERRY PI 4 MODEL B. Taking many fans and community members by surprise, the Raspberry Pi foundation has announced the brand new Raspberry Pi 4 Model B, a significant upgrade to the Raspberry Pi 3 generation. The Raspberry Pi 4 series was not expected until 2020, but according to the launch announcement, the second of four planned silicon revisions for the new device’s processor turned out to be production-ready, saving up to a year of development time. In a blog post announcing the release, Raspberry Pi Ltd founder and CEO, Eben Upton, describes this new model as able to provide a “PC-like level of performance for most users” for the first time, without sacrificing any of the Rasberry Pi’s standard capabilities as a development and hobbyist device. Know More about Raspberry Pi 4 with Technical details…[1] Footnotes[1] What is New in Raspberry Pi 4 Model B - Robu.in | Indian Online Store | RC Hobby | Robotics
